des: "This is a delicious non-alcoholic drink. You may substitute black currant syrup for raspberry syrup. Garnish with more cherries and/or blueberries."
ins: Place 2 cherries and 2 blueberries in each tall glass. Measure 1 tablespoon of raspberry syrup into each glass. Gently pour in the lemonade. top each glass with a scoop of ice cream.
